report.title: Explore records
report.description: Report designed for the explore records facility in iRecord.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN cache_occurrences_nonfunctional onf on onf.id=o.id JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional snf on snf.id=o.sample_id JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl ON cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND o.record_status not in ('I','T') AND (#ownData#=1 OR o.record_status not in ('D','R')) AND ('#searchArea#'='' OR st_intersects(o.public_geom, ST_MakeValid(st_geomfromtext('#searchArea#',900913)))) #idlist#

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: idlist
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence IDs to filter to.

param.name: currentUser
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating that the user owns the record.

param.name: location_id
param.description: Provide the location to display records for

param.name: ownLocality
param.join: JOIN locations lfilter ON st_intersects(lfilter.boundary_geom, o.public_geom) AND lfilter.id=#location_id#

param.name: taxon_groups
param.description: List of taxon group IDs to view data for

column.name: taxon
column.sql: CASE WHEN cttl.preferred_taxon=cttl.default_common_name then cttl.preferred_taxon ELSE cttl.preferred_taxon || COALESCE(' | ' || cttl.default_common_name, '') END

column.name: recorder
column.sql: CASE WHEN o.website_id IN (#website_ids#) THEN '' ELSE snf.website_title || '-> ' END || CASE WHEN LENGTH(snf.recorders)>30 THEN 'Recorder' ELSE snf.recorders END

column.name: belongs_to_user
column.sql: CASE WHEN CAST(o.created_by_id AS character varying) = '#currentUser#' AND o.website_id IN (#website_ids#) THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: sc
column.sql: case o.record_status when 'C' then case o.certainty when 'C' then 'green' when 'L' then 'orange' when 'U' then 'red' else 'blue' end when 'V' then 'green' when 'D' then 'orange' when 'R' then 'red' else 'black' end

column.name: fc
column.sql: case o.record_status when 'V' then 'green' when 'D' then 'orange' when 'R' then 'red' else 'blue' end

column.name: input_form
column.sql: case when o.input_form is null then '#default_input_form#' else o.input_form end
